alert.note: Alert for Otoe (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 11:28PM CDT until June 17 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR SOUTHERN LANCASTER...JOHNSON...SOUTHWESTERN OTOE...SOUTHEASTERN SALINE...NORTHWESTERN PAWNEE AND NORTHERN GAGE COUNTIES... At 1128 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Adams, or 15 miles northeast of Beatrice, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sterling, Crab Orchard, Lewiston and Elk Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
